name: Digital Ange: Dennou Tenshi SS
overview: Digital Ange: Dennou Tenshi SS is an Adventure game, developed by Koga Game Factory and published by Tokuma Shoten, which was released in Japan in 1997. Is it difficult to be kind to people? Do you believe that love is stronger than weapons? The end of the world grows near. Whether it can be saved or not depends on the answers to these questions.
